item.title: Nvidia name-checks Michael Burry in secret memo pushing back on AI bubble allegations
item.description: The chipmaker quietly circulated a private memo to analysts that explicitly name-checked investor Michael Burry and pushed back on many of his claims.

item.title: Michael Burry's next 'Big Short': An inside look at his analysis showing AI is a bubble
item.description: The investment world is "expecting far more economic importance out of this technology than is likely to be provided," Burry's associate portfolio man...
